title: Research Topic: Tech Workers Coalition Global Expansion: 21 Chapters and Resistance Infrastructure (2014-2025)
summary: Based on the research priority 'Tech Workers Coalition Global Expansion: 21 Chapters and Resistance Infrastructure (2014-2025)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Map the growth of the Tech Workers Coalition from its 2014 founding to 21 global chapters, documenting the development of organized resistance infrastructure including tactics like malicious complianc... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
